about.summary: Frontend Developer with over 10 years of experience in building high-performance web applications and 5+ years in UI/UX design.

resume.title: Resume
resume.text: Demonstrate my skills, experience, projects and educations

responsibilities: Developed controllers, mappers, and components using TypeScript and Alpine.js for seamless integration with AEM and GraphQL APIs.
Achieved 95% code coverage with Jest and conducted accessibility testing with NVIDIA tools.
Mentored junior developers and ensured code security with Git Guardian.
Enhanced Extract Builder application for the UK NHS, improving data querying and reporting.
Generated advanced search features and refined application functionality with Cohort-builder-kit.
Delivered 10+ apps and chatbots using React, Angular, and JavaScript.
Designed and built 50+ user-centric interfaces using Adobe XD, Photoshop, and Illustrator.
Maintained code quality through unit testing with Jest, Jasmine, and Karma.

projects.name: T-Mobile
projects.description: Created dynamic components with TypeScript, Alpine.js, and AEM integration via GraphQL.

projects.name: Extract Builder / Feasibility Service
projects.description: Built features for search creation using React (TypeScript), Redux, and REST APIs.

projects.name: Matrix eServices
projects.description: Developed insurance eClaim projects using Angular, PrimeNG, NGRX, and RXJS.

projects.name: Time Tracker
projects.description: Crafted a user-friendly web app for tracking employee activity using React and TailwindCSS.

projects.name: Assistance Chatbot
projects.description: Built a multi-language chatbot with voice recognition and leave planner charts using Angular.

certifications.name: JavaScript Algorithms and Data Structures Masterclass
